title: Brat Pack Member Rob Lowe Gets Quizzed On Bratwurst
teaser: Back in the '80s Lowe was part of Hollywood's Brat Pack, so we've invited him to answer three questions about some of the lesser known facts of bratwurst. Originally broadcast May 9, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
